content: I'm super excited to try out the butterbeer and pumpkin fizz today. I've also heard great things about the theming of the Wizarding World, so I'm looking forward to immersing myself in the experience. Since I have an annual pass, I'm planning to visit at least once a month to try out new attractions and explore different parts of the park. Do you have any recommendations for must-see attractions or experiences that I shouldn't miss?
